concept.title: Change dictionaries dialog box
concept.shortdesc: The Change Dictionaries dialog box allows you to change dictionaries.

section.title: Help
section.p: Opens the Bricsys Help article for the SPELL command.

section.title: Main dictionary
section.p: Specifies the main dictionary to use for spell checking.

dlentry.dd: Specify the dictionary file to use as the main dictionary. Available files are displayed in the drop-down list.
Download additional dictionaries from OpenOffice.org. Opens the Web browser at:

section.title: Custom dictionary
section.p: Specifies a custom dictionary to use for spell checking. Use custom dictionaries for discipline-specific words, such as medical or mechanical terms.

dlentry.dd: Specifies the file name and location of a custom dictionary to use in addition to the main dictionary.
Open the Select Custom Dictionary dialog box to select a custom dictionary file.

section.title: Custom dictionary words
section.p: Specifies words to be included in the custom dictionary.

dlentry.dd: Allows you to enter a word to be included in the custom dictionary.
Add the word you entered in the word field to the custom dictionary.
Displays all the words included in the custom dictionary.
Delete a selected word from the custom dictionary.

section.title: Apply & Close
section.p: Apply your changes and close the dialog box. The custom dictionary file is only updated with added or deleted words after you choose Apply and Close.

section.title: Cancel
section.p: Close the dialog box without applying changes.
